titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce certain contribution limits under such Act.
To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce certain contribution limits under such Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to: (1) lower the limits on contributions to candidates (from $2,000 to $1,000), contributions to nonparty political committees (from $5,000 to $1,000), and contributions by multicandidate political committees to candidates (from $5,000 to $1,000); (2) provide for delay in implementation of indexing of the limit on the maximum amount of contribution to a candidate; and (3) apply indexing to certain other limits.
